title: Polymer Characterization
description: This course introduces the student to surface, near-surface and structural methods of polymer characterization. Specialized techniques critical to physical structure are emphasized. Crosslisted with CHEM, MSE, and PTFE 6752.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CHBE 4775 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 4775 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ME 4775 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MSE 4775 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PTFE 4775 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) or (ME 4777 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MSE 4777 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PTFE 4777 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and CHEM 3411 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
